alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 05 at 3:41PM CDT until September 05 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Pulaski County in central Arkansas... Central Saline County in central Arkansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 341 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Little Rock, North Little Rock, Benton, West Little Rock, Maumelle, Bryant, Southwest Little Rock, Chenal Valley, Pinnacle Mountain State Park, Otter Creek, Salem in Saline County, Burns Park, Morgan, Oak Grove in Pulaski County, Marche, Levy, Camp Robinson, Alexander, Amboy and Cammack Village. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
